Download Today.
Get Inspired.

New market survey data shows that patient acquisition is increasingly impacted by the consumer financial experience. In fact, 44% of patients surveyed stated that it was very important that they had a postive clinical and financial expereince with their doctor when evaluating a new medical provider. Download our Patient Payment Technology Report to learn more, and prepare your team to provide better patient financial experiences.

“We tend to think first and foremost about a patient’s quality of care when we evaluate a provider but the truth is, their financial journey can have just as much of an impact on satisfaction. Hospitals and medical centers that do not prioritize the billing and payment process are putting themselves in a position to lose patients and erode their brand loyalty, even if their clinical care is top notch.”
Clayton Bain, Salucro Founder & CEO

Patient Payment Technology Insights, Directly In Your Inbox

Join 800+ revenue cycle leaders who are learning how to optimize the revenue cycle while providing the best financial experience possible for patients.
